name: Panzer Buster
description:
Panzer Buster is a fast-paced top-down shooter where the goal is to destroy all enemies in the level. To do this, you can use your primary weapon as well as the powerful but limited rockets. Several things, such as pickups and a boost which regenerates when you hit enemies, will aid you in the completion of a level. In the last level you will encounter a boss.

Made for BRSD 7.
